## QualifierTypes.LanguageQualifierType class

[Qualifier type](./ts-res.qualifiertypes.qualifiertype.md) which matches BCP-47 language tags applying [similarity matching](https://github.com/ErikFortune/fgv/tree/main/libraries/ts-bcp47#tag-matching)<!-- -->. Accepts a list of language tags in the context by default.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class LanguageQualifierType extends QualifierType 
```
**Extends:** [QualifierType](./ts-res.qualifiertypes.qualifiertype.md)
